00013 extern NPDevice* NPN_AcquireDevice(NPP instance, NPDeviceID device);

00015 namespace {
00016 
00017 // Callback given to the browser for things like context repaint and draw
00018 // notifications.
00019 void Draw3DCallback(void* data) {
00020   static_cast<tumbler::Tumbler*>(data)->DrawSelf();
00021 }
00022 
00023 // Called by the browser when the 3D context needs to get repainted.
00024 void Repaint3DCallback(NPP instance, NPDeviceContext3D* context) {
00025   tumbler::TumblerContext3D* tumbler_context =
00026       static_cast<tumbler::TumblerContext3D*>(context);
00027   reinterpret_cast<tumbler::Tumbler*>(tumbler_context->user_data_)->DrawSelf();
00028 }
00029 
00030 }  // namespace
00031 
00032 using tumbler::ScriptingBridge;
00033 
00034 namespace tumbler {
00035 
00036 static const int32_t kCommandBufferSize = 1024 * 1024;
00037 
00038 Tumbler::Tumbler(NPP npp)
00039     : npp_(npp),
00040       scriptable_object_(NULL),
00041       device3d_(NULL),
00042       pgl_context_(NULL),
00043       cube_(NULL) {
00044   memset(&context3d_, 0, sizeof(context3d_));
00045   ScriptingBridge::InitializeIdentifiers();
00046 }
00047 
00048 Tumbler::~Tumbler() {
00049   if (scriptable_object_) {
00050     NPN_ReleaseObject(scriptable_object_);
00051   }
00052   // Destroy the cube view while GL context is current.
00053   pglMakeCurrent(pgl_context_);
00054   delete cube_;
00055   pglMakeCurrent(PGL_NO_CONTEXT);
00056 
00057   DestroyContext();
00058 }
00059 
00060 NPObject* Tumbler::GetScriptableObject() {
00061   if (scriptable_object_ == NULL) {
00062     scriptable_object_ =
00063       NPN_CreateObject(npp_, &ScriptingBridge::np_class);
00064   }
00065   if (scriptable_object_) {
00066     NPN_RetainObject(scriptable_object_);
00067   }
00068   return scriptable_object_;
00069 }
00070 
00071 NPError Tumbler::SetWindow(const NPWindow& window) {
00072   if (!pgl_context_) {
00073     CreateContext();
00074   }
00075   if (!pglMakeCurrent(pgl_context_))
00076     return NPERR_INVALID_INSTANCE_ERROR;
00077   if (cube_ == NULL) {
00078     cube_ = new Cube();
00079     cube_->PrepareOpenGL();
00080   }
00081   cube_->Resize(window.width, window.height);
00082   PostRedrawNotification();
00083   return NPERR_NO_ERROR;
00084 }
00085 
00086 void Tumbler::PostRedrawNotification() {
00087   NPN_PluginThreadAsyncCall(npp_, Draw3DCallback, this);
00088 }
00089 
00090 bool Tumbler::DrawSelf() {
00091   if (cube_ == NULL)
00092     return false;
00093 
00094   if (!pglMakeCurrent(pgl_context_) && pglGetError() == PGL_CONTEXT_LOST) {
00095     DestroyContext();
00096     CreateContext();
00097     pglMakeCurrent(pgl_context_);
00098     delete cube_;
00099     cube_ = new Cube();
00100     cube_->PrepareOpenGL();
00101   }
00102 
00103   cube_->Draw();
00104   pglSwapBuffers();
00105   pglMakeCurrent(PGL_NO_CONTEXT);
00106   return true;
00107 }
00108 
00109 bool Tumbler::GetCameraOrientation(float* orientation) const {
00110   if (cube_ != NULL) {
00111     cube_->GetOrientation(orientation);
00112     return true;
00113   }
00114   return false;
00115 }
00116 
00117 bool Tumbler::SetCameraOrientation(const float* orientation) {
00118   if (cube_ != NULL) {
00119     cube_->SetOrientation(orientation);
00120     PostRedrawNotification();
00121     return true;
00122   }
00123   return false;
00124 }
00125 
00126 void Tumbler::CreateContext() {
00127   if (pgl_context_ != NULL)
00128     return;
00129   // Create and initialize a 3D context.
00130   device3d_ = NPN_AcquireDevice(npp_, NPPepper3DDevice);
00131   assert(NULL != device3d_);
00132   NPDeviceContext3DConfig config;
00133   config.commandBufferSize = kCommandBufferSize;
00134   context3d_.repaintCallback = Repaint3DCallback;
00135   context3d_.user_data_ = reinterpret_cast<void*>(this);
00136   device3d_->initializeContext(npp_, &config, &context3d_);
00137 
00138   // Create a PGL context.
00139   pgl_context_ = pglCreateContext(npp_, device3d_, &context3d_);
00140 }
00141 
00142 void Tumbler::DestroyContext() {
00143   if (pgl_context_ == NULL)
00144     return;
00145   pglDestroyContext(pgl_context_);
00146   pgl_context_ = NULL;
00147 
00148   device3d_->destroyContext(npp_, &context3d_);
00149 }
00150 
00151 }  // namespace pinpapi_bridge
